statements: SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_data;
SELECT research_title, researcher_name FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE research_area = 'Geophysics';
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication FROM geothermal_research_data;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_data ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, publication_date FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE research_area = 'Reservoir Engineering' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE research_area = 'Geophysics' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT research_title, findings FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE research_title ILIKE '%modelling%';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_data WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY researcher_name, research_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_findings;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title FROM geothermal_research_findings ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT research_summary FROM geothermal_research_findings WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, publication_year FROM research_publications WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title, research_date FROM geothermal_research_findings WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_research_findings;
SELECT researcher_name, research_date FROM geothermal_research_findings WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_year FROM research_publications WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title, research_summary FROM geothermal_research_findings WHERE researcher_name ILIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_year DESC, publication_author ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT research_id, research_title, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_link FROM publications WHERE publication_type = 'Journal';
SELECT * FROM research_findings JOIN researchers ON research_findings.researcher_name = researchers.researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT research_title, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT research_id, research_title, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE research_title LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY research_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Geothermal_Research_Study;
SELECT study_title, study_author FROM Geothermal_Research_Study WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_date FROM Geothermal_Publications WHERE publication_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM Research_Teams WHERE team_department = 'Geology';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, facility_capacity FROM Research_Facilities WHERE facility_cost < 5000.00;
SELECT study_id, study_title, study_author, study_date FROM Geothermal_Research_Study;
SELECT * FROM Research_Teams WHERE team_department = 'Geology';
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, publication_author, publication_url FROM Geothermal_Publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, facility_location, facility_capacity FROM Research_Facilities WHERE facility_cost < 5000.00;
SELECT study_id, study_title, study_abstract, study_author, study_date FROM Geothermal_Research_Study ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeothermalLocations;
SELECT location_name, country FROM GeothermalLocations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, researcher_name, project_id FROM Publications WHERE researcher_name='John Doe';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, email FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation='University X';
SELECT location_id, location_name, country FROM GeothermalLocations;
SELECT * FROM ResearchFindings WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY finding_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, researcher_name, project_id FROM Publications WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects WHERE lead_researcher = 'Dr. Smith' AND end_date > '2023-06-30';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, email FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
